name: wicket
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in cricket, a set of three vertical sticks with two small pieces of wood balanced across the top of them, at which the ball is aimed. There are two wickets on a cricket field.
Berndt Fischer/Oxford Scientific/GettyImages
in cricket, the length of ground between two sets of wickets
in cricket, a turn that a player has to hit the ball: Five wickets have fallen since tea time (= five players have been caused to finish their turn). As a fast bowler, he took many wickets (= caused many players to finish their turns).
